prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a bug with a mystical aura.
Generate a unique creature that has a shell and an ethereal presence.
Imagine a Pokemon with a haunting appearance and a delicate halo.
Design a Pokemon inspired by the afterlife, featuring a unique outer shell.
Show me a bug-ghost hybrid Pokemon that has a mysterious background.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of a fallen warrior with a shell.
Give me a creature that combines both ghostly and insect traits in its design.
